oai_dc:dc.dc:title: Control of excitons in multi-layer van der Waals heterostructures
oai_dc:dc.dc:creator: Calman, E. V.
Dorow, C. J.
Fogler, M. M.
Butov, L. V.
Hu, S.
Mishchenko, A.
Geim, A. K.
oai_dc:dc.dc:subject: Condensed Matter - Mesoscale and Nanoscale Physics
oai_dc:dc.dc:description: We report an experimental study of excitons in a double quantum well van der Waals heterostructure made of atomically thin layers of \Mo* and hexagonal boron nitride (hBN). The emission of neutral and charged excitons is controlled by gate voltage, temperature, and both the helicity and the power of optical excitation.
